data.eml:eml: Notes on the Homoneura (Homoneura) beckeri group from the Oriental Region, with descriptions of ten new species from China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Li, Yang, Ding (2009): Notes on the Homoneura (Homoneura) beckeri group from the Oriental Region, with descriptions of ten new species from China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae). Zootaxa 2325: 1-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.192037
